sentences.en: A profusion of leaves bursts out on trees in the springtime.
sentences.cn: 春天许许多多的叶子从树上冒出来.

sentences.en: At springtime this river always overruns.
sentences.cn: 每到春天这条河总会泛滥。

sentences.en: But I just love flowers in springtime.
sentences.cn: 但是我只喜欢春天盛开的花.

sentences.en: It was springtime and the slopes were ablaze with almond blossoms.
sentences.cn: 时当春季,怒放的扁桃花使那片山坡鲜红似火.

sentences.en: Springtime usually heralds a tilt at silverware, but not this year.
sentences.cn: 春季通常都能预兆联赛冠军的得主, 但今年不是这样.

sentences.en: That time was the springtime of love for Eugenie.
sentences.cn: 从此,欧也妮进入了爱情里的春天.

sentences.en: The blossom on the trees looks lovely in ( the ) springtime.
sentences.cn: 春天里树上开的花很漂亮.

sentences.en: The blossom on the trees looks lovely in springtime.
The Greek Islands are lovely in springtime.
sentences.cn: 希腊诸岛在春天非常秀美.

sentences.en: The house is spruced up and it is springtime for the parents.
sentences.cn: 房子焕然一新,父母心花怒放.

sentences.en: The ring on the spring string rings during springtime.
sentences.cn: 弹簧弦上的环在春天鸣响.
全市都洋溢着春天的气息.

sentences.en: These forests are a host to a rich variety of springtime migrants.
sentences.cn: 在春天,这些森林为种类繁多的侯鸟提供了栖息之地.

sentences.en: This thinning occurred during September and October springtime in the Southern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这种稀释过程发生在南半球9月和10月的春季.

sentences.en: Which is why, at a price, we still have Paris in springtime.
sentences.cn: 这也是今天我们（付出代价后）在巴黎仍能享受春天的原因。

sentences.en: Winter always thaws into springtime. Your problem will be solved.
sentences.cn: 寒冬总会转变为暖春. 你的困难也终会得到解决.

words.tran_cn: 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃
使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开

trans.tran_en: the time of the year when it is spring
